s1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position.
Make sure that washer fluid is spouted out from the headlight washer nozzle to the headlight surface when the headlight washer switch or front washer switch is turned on.
If headlight washer does not operate, go to “Headlight Washer Symptom Diagnosis (If Equipped)”.

attention3.ptxt: The headlight washer works only when the headlight is turned on. The headlight washer spouts washer fluid on the headlight surface when the headlight washer switch or front washer switch is turned on. In addition, in case using the front washer switch, the headlight washer works only once after the headlight on.
